name: JCole: The Masked Goal
description:
JCole: The Masked Goal

Have you ever tried understanding the core principles behind the thought process of a British rapper? What about an American one? Well, me neither, but now you can, in this brand new style of game which will make you hate your mouse and keyboard! Play as J. Cole, fight with MF DOOM and fight for the obtainable goal.

CONTROLS

WASD - movement

E - pick up / use

SHIFT - sprint

LMB - use item / attack

MMB - throw item

SCROLL  & [1-8] - change items

FEATURES
  • an obtainable goal
  • nice dose of frustration
  • autosave system (download only)
